KeysToMetaData.AimPassthrough: Aim Pass-through: Use touch input to control your aim while holding the Fire Button.
KeysToMetaData.AutoADS: Auto-ADS: Automatically enter Aim-Down-Sights while holding the Fire Button.
KeysToMetaData.FireOnRelease: Fire-On-Release: Fire your weapon when the Fire Button is released rather than when it is pressed. Firing can be canceled by pressing the Cancel Button.
KeysToMetaData.MovementPassthrough: Movement Pass-through: Use touch input to control your movement while holding the Fire Button.
